com.aurel.track.admin.customize.lists

Interface ListOrOptionBaseBL

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomListBL, CustomOptionBaseBL, CustomOptionCascadingSelectBL, CustomOptionSimpleSelectBL, CustomOptionTreeSelectBL, IssueTypeConfigBL, OptionBaseBL, PriorityConfigBL, SeverityConfigBL, StatusConfigBL, SystemOptionBaseBL, SystemOptionWithAssignmentBaseBL

    public interface ListOrOptionBaseBL
    Base business logic interface for list or list options Contains the CRUD methods for lists and list entries (load, save, delete etc.)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ListOrOptionBaseBL.ENTRY_TYPE
